org.hibernate.ogm.datastore.keyvalue.options.navigation

Interface KeyValueStoreGlobalContext<G extends KeyValueStoreGlobalContext<G,E>,E extends KeyValueStoreEntityContext<E,?>>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GlobalContext<G,E>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    EhcacheGlobalContext, InfinispanGlobalContext
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseKeyValueStoreGlobalContext, EhcacheGlobalContextImpl, InfinispanGlobalContextImpl

    public interface KeyValueStoreGlobalContext<G extends KeyValueStoreGlobalContext<G,E>,E extends KeyValueStoreEntityContext<E,?>>
extends GlobalContext<G,E>
    Allows to configure key/value store options applying on a global level. These options may be overridden for single entities or properties.
    Author:
    Gunnar Morling

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      G cacheMapping(CacheMappingType cacheMapping)
      Specifies how data (entity, associations, id source) should be mapped to caches.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.hibernate.ogm.options.navigation.GlobalContext

        entity

    • Method Detail

      • cacheMapping

        G cacheMapping(CacheMappingType cacheMapping)
        Specifies how data (entity, associations, id source) should be mapped to caches.
        Parameters:
        cacheMapping - the cache mapping type to be used when not configured on the entity or property level
        Returns:
        this context, allowing for further fluent API invocations
